'''0.2.1''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on September 19, 2010, which fixes bugs.<ref>https://notch.tumblr.com/post/1146022016/minecraft-server-021</ref>

== Fixes ==
* [[Fishing rod]]s no longer break everything.
* Fixed bug with [[furnace]]s in [[multiplayer]].
* Bad [[commands]] from [[player]]s no longer crash servers.
